home

what is this?

megan-zk is my personal knowledge database, loosely based on the Zettelkasten Method↗. Other inspiration comes from Andy Matuschak’s Evergreen Notes↗ as well as this list of digital gardens↗ on Github and this list of public zettelkastens↗, also on Github.

technical info

Notes are indexed by tag and type. Tags indicate what the note is about, while the note type indicates the structure of the note itself. Notes have a specific structure and can be linked to each other via hierarchal or non-hierarchal relationships.
